iadan was a human Feloguard that stood watch over the showroom of Felogyrs Fireworks in Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Liadan was a pale-skinned human woman with mousy-blonde hair. She was outfitted with a simple chainmail and a spear.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute planted its roots in Baldurs Gate and ravaged the Western Heartlands, Felogyrs Fireworks shop fell under the cults sway. Its proprietor, Avery Sonshal, was made into a True Soul and used the shop as a front for the cults terrorist activities. During that time, Liadan was employed as a Feloguard, standing guard of the shops first floor and Avery himself, as he dealt with regular customers, selling them fireworks. Liadan knowingly or unknowingly also guarded the shops areas that were off-limits to all but the Banite members of the Cult of the Absolute.
